title: Young Jack and the Witch (Dub)
alternative_title: Shounen Jack to Mahou Tsukai; 少年ジャックと魔法使い
description: Jack is a boy who lives with his animal friends Barnaby Bear, Dinah Dog, Squeeker Mouse and Phineas Fox. He's challenged to a race with Allegra, who turns out to be a witch. She takes Jack to the queen witch, Auriana. She plans on turning all her slaves into evil harpies.
